url.title: Jira URL
url.description: URL of the Jira instance, e.g., https://airbyteio.atlassian.net (Cloud), https://my-jira-server.com (Server/DC)

username.title: Username
username.description: The user email for your Jira account. Required when using Cloud. Do NOT use in combination with Server/DC Personal access token

password.title: Password (Server/DC) or API Token (Cloud)
password.description: The password (Server/DC) or API Token (Cloud) for your Jira account. Required when using Cloud. Do NOT use in combination with Server/DC Personal access token

token.title: Personal access token (Server/DC)
token.description: Personal access token. See https://confluence.atlassian.com/enterprise/using-personal-access-tokens-1026032365.html for more information.

additional_fields.title: Additional Fields
additional_fields.description: Fields to include on tasks. Use '*' to include all fields.

additional_fields_array_limit.title: Additional Fields Array Limit
additional_fields_array_limit.description: Truncates an additional fields array value to the given length

reject_unauthorized.title: Enable certificate validation
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the Jira server

concurrency_limit.title: Concurrency Limit
concurrency_limit.description: Controls the concurrency of certain tasks

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to use when a Jira API request fails

retry_delay.title: Retry Delay
retry_delay.description: Time in milliseconds to wait before retrying a failed request

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the Jira API.

custom_headers.title: Custom Headers
custom_headers.description: JSON map of custom headers to include in all requests to the Jira API. Useful for authentication headers or other required headers.

users_prefix_search_max_depth.title: Users Prefix Search Max Depth
users_prefix_search_max_depth.description: Maximum depth for prefix search when use_users_prefix_search is enabled. Controls how many characters deep the search will go (e.g., 2 = 'aa', 3 = 'aaa').

users_prefix_search_api_hard_limit.title: Users Prefix Search API Hard Limit
users_prefix_search_api_hard_limit.description: Number of results that indicates we've hit Jira's API search limit and should expand to deeper prefix searches.

use_faros_graph_boards_selection.title: Use Faros Graph for Boards selection
use_faros_graph_boards_selection.description: Use Faros Graph for selecting which boards should be fetched (Faros credentials are required).

projects.title: Project Keys
projects.description: List of Jira project keys from which to fetch data. By default, all projects are included.

excluded_projects.title: Excluded Project Keys
excluded_projects.description: List of Jira project keys from which data won't be fetched. By default, no projects are excluded. If projects list is specified, this list will be ignored.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

cutoff_lag_days.title: Cutoff Lag Days
cutoff_lag_days.description: Apply lag to the end cutoff saved in the state. Objects updated after this will be rewritten during the next sync.

boards.title: Board IDs
boards.description: List of Jira board IDs from which to fetch data. By default, all boards are included.

excluded_boards.title: Board IDs Excluded
excluded_boards.description: List of Jira board IDs from which data won't be fetched. By default, no boards are excluded. If boards list is specified, this list will be ignored.

run_mode.title: Run Mode
run_mode.description: Run mode for selecting the usage of the connector

custom_streams.title: Custom Streams
custom_streams.description: List of streams to run when selected Run Mode is Custom (if empty, all available streams will run)

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of projects and boards to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute projects and boards across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources

round_robin_bucket_execution.title: Round Robin Bucket Execution
round_robin_bucket_execution.description: When enabled, syncs rotate through all buckets, processing one bucket per sync. When disabled, only the bucket specified by 'bucket_id' is synced.

bucket_ranges.title: Bucket Ranges
bucket_ranges.description: List of bucket ranges to process when round robin bucket execution is enabled. Each element can be either a single bucket number (e.g., '7') or a range of buckets (e.g., '3-5'). All bucket numbers must be between 1 and 'bucket_total'.

api_key.title: Faros API Key
api_key.description: The Faros API key to use to access the API.

use_sprints_reverse_search.title: Use Sprints Reverse Search
use_sprints_reverse_search.description: Fetch closed sprints starting with most recent in backlog. Use this for Jira instances with a lots closed sprints and syncing sprints is slow.

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.

fetch_teams.title: Fetch Teams
fetch_teams.description: Fetch teams from organization to populate teams and team memberships.

organization_id.title: Organization ID
organization_id.description: Atlassian organization ID for fetching teams. Required only when using Fetch Teams with Jira Cloud. See https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirakb/what-it-is-the-organization-id-and-where-to-find-it-1207189876.html for information on how to find it.

use_faros_board_issue_tracker.title: Use Board Issue Tracker
use_faros_board_issue_tracker.description: Use stateful board issue tracker to track issues on boards. This uses the Faros API to persist the state of boards between runs. Requires faros_source_id to be configured.

use_projects_as_boards.title: Use Projects as Boards
use_projects_as_boards.description: Deprecated: Use default behaviour (disabled) and sync Jira boards. When enabled, Jira project boards are not synced and each project has a single board with the project UID and all issues.

source_qualifier.title: Source Qualifier
source_qualifier.description: The qualifier to append as a suffix to the Jira source name to ensure uniqueness among entities with similar IDs when syncing multiple Jira instances, while preserving their original IDs, e.g. for Boards and Sprints.

fetch_audit_events.title: Fetch Audit Events
fetch_audit_events.description: Enable syncing of audit events, for tracking deleted Jira issues
